body:
I also went with TFRecords in the end. I simply joined the files in when
generating the TFRecords.

On Sun, May 21, 2017, 12:44 Chris Watts <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> instead, but it would be nice to just have a way to ues two
> string_input_producers in conjunction.
